title: Jeff Bezos vs Mansa Musa. Epic Rap Battles Of History
author: ERB
description:
Jeff Bezos vs Mansa Musa. Epic Rap Battles Of History. 
Huge thank you to NordVPN for sponsoring this battle! Go to https://NordVPN.com/EPIC to get a 2-year plan with a huge epic discount!

It's the King of Amazon versus the King of Mali who are both known for being the richest men on Earth during their lifetime. Two merchants with very different backgrounds!

Thank you as ever to all of our wonderful patrons. You folk are the best!
To join our crew go to: http://patreon.com/erb 
[Special shout out to theformerprez for being so helpful on this battle]

Epic Rap Battles of History: Jeff Bezos vs Mansa Musa
Who won? Whoâ€™s next? You decide! 
Watch the Behind The Scenes: http://www.youtube.com/erb2

Beat Produced by: Flawless Tracks
https://www.youtube.com/flawlesstracks
Extra Instrumentation: Nice Peter

#epicrapbattles #erb #epicrapbattleofhistory #Amazon #Bezos #mansamusa #jeffbezos
